Step 2: In a large bowl, combine 3 cups of chopped ripe tomatoes, 1 cucumber (diced), and 1/2 red onion (thinly sliced).
Step 3: Add the toasted bread cubes to the bowl with the vegetables.
Step 4: In a small bowl, whisk together 3 tablespoons of olive oil, 1 tablespoon of red wine vinegar, 1 teaspoon of Dijon mustard, salt, and freshly cracked black pepper to taste.
Step 5: Pour the dressing over the bread and vegetable mixture and toss gently to coat the bread with the vinaigrette.
Step 6: Let the Salad sit for 15-20 Mins to allow the bread to absorb the flavors of the dressing.
Step 7: Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve immediately or refrigerate for a cool, refreshing option.
recipe_ingredients: 4 cups day-old crusty bread, cut into cubes
Salt and freshly cracked black pepper to taste

seafood.recipe_description: A rich and flavorful Indian dish made with prawns cooked in a spicy and aromatic tomato-based masala sauce. Perfect for pairing with rice or naan.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add 1 finely chopped onion and sauté until golden brown.
Step 2: Add 2 cloves of garlic (minced) and 1-inch piece of ginger (minced), and cook for another minute until fragrant.

Step 3: Add 2 chopped tomatoes, 1 teaspoon of turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon of red chili powder, 1 teaspoon of garam masala, and salt to taste. Cook until the tomatoes break down and form a thick paste.
Step 4: Add 500g of prawns (peeled and deveined) and cook for 5-6 Mins until the prawns turn pink and are cooked through.
Step 5: Add 1/2 cup of water and stir to combine. Let it simmer for 5 Mins, allowing the flavors to meld.
Step 6: Stir in 1 tablespoon of fresh cilantro (chopped) and a squeeze of lime juice for a burst of freshness.
Step 7: Serve hot with steamed rice or naan.

seafood.recipe_description: A flavorful and aromatic fish dish marinated in a blend of yogurt, spices, and herbs, then grilled to perfection. Tandoori Fish is a Healthy and delicious option for Seafood lovers.
recipe_steps: Step 1: In a bowl, combine 1/2 cup of plain yogurt, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon ginger-garlic paste, 1 teaspoon red chili powder, 1 teaspoon garam masala, 1 teaspoon turmeric powder, and salt to taste. Mix well to form a smooth marinade.

Step 2: Add 500g of fish fillets (such as tilapia or cod) to the marinade, ensuring the fish is well-coated. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 Mins (or up to 2 Hrs) to let the flavors infuse.
Step 3: Preheat the grill or oven to 400°F (200°C). If using an oven, line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 4: Place the marinated fish on the grill or baking sheet. Grill for 10-12 Mins, flipping halfway through, until the fish is cooked through and slightly charred on the edges.
Step 5: Garnish with fresh cilantro and a squeeze of lemon juice before serving.
Step 6: Serve hot with naan or steamed rice.
recipe_ingredients: 500g fish fillets (tilapia, cod, or any firm fish)

seafood.recipe_description: Crispy, golden-brown shrimp coated in a flavorful seasoned batter and fried to perfection. Perfect as an appetizer or served with a dipping sauce.
recipe_steps: Step 1: In a bowl, whisk together 1 cup of all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper.
Step 2: In a separate bowl, beat 1 egg and add 1/4 cup of milk. Mix well.
Step 3: Dip 500g of peeled and deveined shrimp into the egg mixture, then dredge them in the seasoned flour mixture, making sure they are fully coated.
Step 4: Heat 2 cups of vegetable oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot, fry the shrimp in batches for 2-3 Mins, or until golden brown and crispy.
Step 5: Remove the shrimp from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.
Step 6: Serve the fried shrimp with your favorite dipping sauce, such as cocktail sauce or tartar sauce.

seafood.recipe_description: Grilled Octopus is a delicious and tender Seafood dish marinated in olive oil, garlic, and herbs, then grilled to perfection. It’s smoky, flavorful, and perfect for Seafood lovers.
recipe_steps: Step 1: In a large bowl, combine 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, salt, and pepper to taste.
Step 2: Add the octopus (about 1 kg) to the marinade and toss to coat evenly. Let it marinate for at least 1 Hr or up to 4 Hrs in the refrigerator.
Step 3: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Step 4: Grill the octopus for about 3-4 Mins per side, or until it develops a nice char and is cooked through. Ensure that the octopus is tender, and the edges are crispy.
Step 5: Remove the octopus from the grill and let it rest for a few Mins before slicing into pieces.
Step 6: Serve with fresh lemon wedges and a drizzle of olive oil.

seafood.recipe_description: Lobster Thermidor is a classic French dish featuring a rich and creamy lobster meat sauce, topped with a golden brown crust. It’s a decadent and elegant dish perfect for special occasions.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Cook the lobster: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the live lobster and cook for 10-12 Mins, or until the shell turns bright red. Remove the lobster from the pot and let it cool.
Step 2: Remove the lobster meat: Once cooled, crack the lobster shell and remove the meat from the tail and claws. Cut the meat into bite-sized pieces.

Step 3: Prepare the sauce: In a saucepan, melt 2 tablespoons of butter. Add 2 tablespoons of flour and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually whisk in 1 cup of heavy cream, 1/2 cup of white wine, and 1/4 cup of lobster stock. Bring the sauce to a simmer and cook until thickened, stirring occasionally.
Step 4: Add the lobster meat: Stir in the lobster meat to the sauce and season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of nutmeg. Remove the sauce from the heat.
Step 5: Assemble the dish: Divide the lobster mixture among 4 ramekins. Top each ramekin with a generous amount of grated Gruyère cheese.
Step 6: Broil the dish: Broil the ramekins under a preheated broiler for 2-3 Mins, or until the cheese is golden brown and bubbly.
Step 7: Serve immediately: Serve the Lobster Thermidor hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

seafood.recipe_description: Grilled Oysters are a simple yet elegant appetizer. Fresh oysters are topped with a flavorful topping and grilled to perfection, creating a smoky and delicious treat.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Step 2: Shuck the oysters, reserving the liquid. Discard any oysters that are open or damaged.
Step 3: Prepare the topping: In a small bowl, combine 1 tablespoon butter, 1 clove garlic (minced), 1/4 cup breadcrumbs, 1 tablespoon chopped parsley, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
Step 4: Top the oysters: Place the oysters on a baking sheet or grill pan. Top each oyster with a spoonful of the prepared topping.
Step 5: Grill the oysters: Place the oysters on the preheated grill and cook for 4-5 Mins, or until the oysters are plump and the topping is golden brown and bubbly.
Step 6: Serve immediately: Serve the grilled oysters hot with lemon wedges.

seafood.recipe_description: Seared Tuna Steaks is a quick and easy dish that showcases the natural flavor of tuna. The steaks are seared to perfection and topped with sesame seeds for a nutty crunch.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Prepare the tuna: Cut the tuna into 1-inch thick steaks. Season both sides with salt and pepper.
Step 2: Heat the pan: Heat a cast-iron skillet or heavy-bottomed pan over high heat. Add a drizzle of olive oil to coat the pan.
Step 3: Sear the tuna: Place the tuna steaks in the hot pan and sear for 1-2 Mins per side, or until desired level of doneness is reached. For medium-rare, the center should be slightly pink.
Step 4: Add sesame seeds: Sprinkle sesame seeds over the seared tuna steaks.
Step 5: Rest and serve: Remove the tuna steaks from the pan and let them rest for a few Mins before serving. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce, such as soy sauce, wasabi, or ponzu sauce.

seafood.recipe_description: Grilled Salmon with Lemon-Dill Sauce is a classic dish that's easy to make and packed with flavor. The salmon is grilled to perfection and topped with a tangy and herbaceous lemon-dill sauce.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Prepare the salmon: Rinse the salmon fillets and pat them dry with paper towels. Season both sides with salt and pepper.
Step 2: Grill the salmon: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Place the salmon fillets skin-side down on the grill and cook for 4-5 Mins per side, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.

Step 3: Make the lemon-dill sauce: In a small bowl, whisk together 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill, 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
Step 4: Serve: Drizzle the lemon-dill sauce over the grilled salmon and serve immediately.

seafood.recipe_description: Grilled Swordfish Steaks with Chimichurri Sauce is a flavor-packed dish that's perfect for a summer meal. The swordfish is grilled to perfection and topped with a vibrant and zesty chimichurri sauce.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Prepare the swordfish: Rinse the swordfish steaks and pat them dry with paper towels. Season both sides with salt and pepper.
Step 2: Grill the swordfish: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Place the swordfish steaks on the grill and cook for 4-5 Mins per side, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.

Step 3: Make the chimichurri sauce: In a food processor or blender, combine 1/2 cup fresh parsley, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, 2 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Pulse until the sauce is finely chopped.
Step 4: Serve: Drizzle the chimichurri sauce over the grilled swordfish and serve immediately.

seafood.recipe_description: Crab cakes are a classic Seafood dish featuring lump crab meat mixed with a flavorful binder and then pan-fried or baked to golden perfection.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Prepare the crab mixture: In a large bowl, combine 1 pound lump crab meat, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup Dijon mustard, 1/4 cup finely chopped onion, 1/4 cup finely chopped celery, 1 egg, 1/4 cup breadcrumbs, 1 teaspoon Old Bay seasoning, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Mix gently until combined.
Step 2: Form the crab cakes: Divide the crab mixture into 8 equal portions. Shape each portion into a patty about 1-inch thick.

Step 3: Cook the crab cakes: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add enough oil to coat the pan. Place the crab cakes in the pan and cook for 3-4 Mins per side, or until golden brown and crispy.
Step 4: Serve: Serve the crab cakes hot with your favorite dipping sauce, such as tartar sauce or remoulade sauce.

healthy.recipe_description: Chicken and rice soup is a warm, comforting dish made with tender chicken, soft rice, and a flavorful broth. It’s easy to digest and perfect for soothing the stomach while providing nourishment.
recipe_steps: Step 1: In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add 1 chopped onion and sauté for 3-4 Mins until softened.
Step 2: Add 2 minced garlic cloves and sauté for another 30 seconds until fragrant.
Step 3: Add 1-2 chicken breasts or thighs, 6 cups of chicken broth, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer.
Step 4: Let the chicken cook for about 20-25 Mins, or until fully cooked.
Step 5: While the chicken is cooking, rinse 1/2 cup of rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
Step 6: After the chicken is cooked, remove it from the pot, shred or slice it, and return it to the pot.
Step 7: Add the rice to the soup and continue to simmer for another 15-20 Mins, or until the rice is tender.
Step 8: Taste the soup and adjust the seasoning with more salt, pepper, or a splash of lemon juice if desired.

healthy.recipe_description: Tomato and basil soup is a soothing, light soup made with ripe tomatoes and fresh basil. Its smooth texture and mild flavor make it easy on the stomach, perfect for a comforting meal.
recipe_steps: Step 1: In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add 1 chopped onion and sauté for 3-4 Mins until softened.
Step 2: Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and sauté for another 30 seconds until fragrant.
Step 3: Add 4 cups of diced tomatoes (fresh or canned) and 3 cups of vegetable broth. Bring to a boil.
Step 4: Reduce the heat and let it simmer for 15-20 Mins, allowing the flavors to combine.
Step 5: Add 1/4 cup of fresh basil leaves and simmer for an additional 5 Mins.
Step 6: Use an immersion blender to blend the soup until smooth (or blend in batches if using a regular blender).
Step 7: Season with salt and pepper to taste. Optionally, drizzle with a bit of cream or garnish with extra basil leaves before serving.
recipe_ingredients: Optional: cream or extra basil for garnish

healthy.recipe_description: Boiled Egg Salad is a light, nutritious, and easy-to-digest dish that combines boiled eggs with fresh vegetables and a simple dressing. It’s gentle on the stomach and perfect for a quick meal.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Boil 4 eggs in a pot of water for about 10 Mins until fully cooked. Once done, peel the eggs and slice them into quarters.
Step 2: In a large bowl, combine 1 cup of mixed Salad greens (such as spinach, lettuce, or arugula), 1/2 cucumber (sliced), and 1/2 red onion (thinly sliced).
Step 3: Add the sliced boiled eggs to the Salad mixture.
Step 4: In a small bowl, whisk together 1 tablespoon of olive oil, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, salt, and pepper to taste to create the dressing.
Step 5: Pour the dressing over the Salad and toss gently to combine all the ingredients.
Step 6: Serve immediately or chill in the fridge before serving.

healthy.recipe_description: Curd rice is a simple, soothing dish made with cooked rice and yogurt. It’s light on the stomach, easy to digest, and perfect for a comforting meal, often enjoyed with a sprinkle of seasoning and fresh herbs.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Cook 1 cup of rice according to package instructions. Let it cool to room temperature.
Step 2: In a bowl, mix the cooled rice with 1 cup of plain yogurt and a pinch of salt.
Step 3: In a separate small pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil. Add 1 teaspoon of mustard seeds, 1/2 teaspoon of cumin seeds, and 1 dried red chili. Sauté until the seeds start to splutter.
Step 4: Add 1/4 teaspoon of turmeric powder, 1/4 teaspoon of asafetida (hing), and 1 tablespoon of chopped fresh cilantro. Stir well.
Step 5: Pour the tempering over the curd rice mixture and mix gently.
Step 6: Optional: Garnish with pomegranate seeds or roasted cashews for extra flavor and crunch.
recipe_ingredients: Optional: pomegranate seeds or roasted cashews for garnish

healthy.recipe_description: Vegetable soup is a hearty, nutritious dish made with a variety of fresh vegetables in a light broth. It's easy on the stomach and provides comfort, warmth, and essential nutrients.
recipe_steps: Step 1: In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add 1 chopped onion and sauté for 3-4 Mins until softened.
Step 2: Add 2 cloves of minced garlic, 1 diced carrot, 1 diced celery stalk, and 1 diced potato. Sauté for another 3-4 Mins.
Step 3: Pour in 4 cups of vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Step 4: Once boiling, reduce the heat and add 1 cup of chopped tomatoes, 1/2 cup of green beans, and 1/2 cup of peas. Let the soup simmer for 20-25 Mins until the vegetables are tender.
Step 5: Season with salt, pepper, and 1 teaspoon of dried thyme or Italian seasoning.
Step 6: Optional: Blend the soup with an immersion blender for a smoother texture or leave it chunky for added texture. Serve hot.
recipe_ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried thyme or Italian seasoning

healthy.recipe_description: Zucchini soup is a light, nutrient-rich, and low-calorie dish. This soup is packed with vitamins and minerals, making it a Healthy and refreshing option that is easy to digest.
recipe_steps: Step 1: In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add 1 chopped onion and sauté for 3-4 Mins until softened.
Step 2: Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and sauté for another 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 3: Add 4 cups of chopped zucchini and sauté for 5-6 Mins until the zucchini starts to soften.
Step 4: Pour in 4 cups of vegetable broth and bring the mixture to a boil.
Step 5: Once boiling, reduce the heat and let the soup simmer for 15-20 Mins, until the zucchini is very soft.
Step 6: Blend the soup using an immersion blender or a regular blender until smooth and creamy.
Step 7: Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of nutmeg or thyme to taste.
Step 8: Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs or a drizzle of olive oil if desired.
recipe_ingredients: Optional: Fresh herbs or olive oil for garnish

healthy.recipe_description: Baked sweet potatoes are a nutritious, easy-to-make dish. Rich in fiber, vitamins, and antioxidants, they provide a satisfying and Healthy option that can be enjoyed as a side or main meal.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
Step 2: Wash and scrub 4 medium-sized sweet potatoes thoroughly. Pat them dry with a towel.
Step 3: Pierce each sweet potato with a fork 3-4 times to allow steam to escape while baking.
Step 4: Rub each sweet potato with a little olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Step 5: Place the sweet potatoes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Step 6: Bake for 45-60 Mins, or until the sweet potatoes are soft when pierced with a fork.
Step 7: Optional: Once baked, slice the sweet potatoes open and top with your favorite toppings such as butter, cinnamon, or Greek yogurt.
recipe_ingredients: Optional toppings: Butter, cinnamon, or Greek yogurt

healthy.recipe_description: Tofu and vegetables is a simple, Healthy dish packed with protein and essential nutrients. It's a versatile recipe, where tofu is sautéed with colorful vegetables for a light and nutritious meal.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Press the tofu to remove excess water, then cut it into cubes.
Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the tofu cubes and sauté for 5-7 Mins until golden and crispy on all sides. Remove and set aside.
Step 3: In the same pan, add 1 chopped onion, 1 bell pepper, and 1 zucchini, all chopped into bite-sized pieces. Sauté for 5-6 Mins until the vegetables are tender.
Step 4: Add 2 cloves of minced garlic, 1 tablespoon of soy sauce, and a pinch of black pepper. Stir and cook for another 1-2 Mins.
Step 5: Add the cooked tofu back to the pan and mix everything together. Let it cook for another 2-3 Mins.
Step 6: Optional: Garnish with fresh herbs like cilantro or green onions before serving.
recipe_ingredients: Optional garnish: Fresh cilantro or green onions

healthy.recipe_description: French Onion Soup is a comforting, flavorful soup made with caramelized onions, rich broth, and topped with toasted bread and melted cheese. A healthier version can be made with minimal fat while maintaining its rich taste.
recipe_steps: Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add 4 large onions, thinly sliced, and cook for 20-25 Mins, stirring occasionally, until the onions are caramelized and golden brown.
Step 2: Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and cook for another 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 3: Pour in 4 cups of low-sodium vegetable or beef broth and bring to a simmer.
Step 4: Add 1 bay leaf, 1 teaspoon of thyme, and salt and pepper to taste. Let the soup simmer for 20 Mins to develop the flavors.
Step 5: Meanwhile, preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C) and toast 4 slices of whole-grain bread.
Step 6: Remove the bay leaf from the soup. Ladle the soup into oven-safe bowls, and top each with a slice of toasted bread and a sprinkle of low-fat cheese (optional).
Step 7: Place the bowls under the broiler for 2-3 Mins or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Step 8: Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.
recipe_ingredients: 4 cups low-sodium vegetable or beef broth

healthy.recipe_description: Sweet Corn Soup is a light, comforting soup made with fresh corn kernels, vegetables, and broth. It's a nutritious and low-calorie option that’s perfect for any meal or as a starter.
recipe_steps: Step 1: In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add 1 small onion, finely chopped, and cook until softened, about 3-4 Mins.
Step 2: Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and cook for another 1 minute until fragrant.
Step 3: Add 4 cups of vegetable broth and bring to a simmer.
Step 4: Add 2 cups of fresh or frozen corn kernels, 1 medium-sized carrot (diced), and 1 celery stalk (diced). Simmer for 15-20 Mins until the vegetables are tender.
Step 5: Use an immersion blender to blend the soup to your desired consistency. You can blend it completely for a creamy texture or leave it slightly chunky for more texture.
Step 6: Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of paprika or cayenne pepper for some extra flavor.
Step 7: Ladle the soup into bowls and garnish with fresh parsley or cilantro if desired.
Step 8: Serve hot, with a slice of whole-grain bread if desired.
recipe_ingredients: 2 cups fresh or frozen corn kernels
Fresh parsley or cilantro for garnish (optional)
